description.ko: 디지털 음향과 추상적 기하학적 형태의 교차점을 탐구하며, 음파가 복잡한 3D 건축적 풍경으로 구현되는 실험적인 시청각 여정입니다.
description.en: An experimental audiovisual journey exploring the intersection of digital acoustics and abstract geometric forms, where sound waves manifest as intricate 3D architectural landscapes.

prompt: High-definition digital art, sound visualization of ECHO-0, pulsing sonic waves transforming into crystalline architectural structures, neon blue and deep obsidian color palette, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, mathematical wave patterns, futuristic aesthetic.
